fields.name: type
fields.desc: The type of list section, either base or inset grouped.

fields.name: header
fields.desc: Sets the form section header. The section header lies above the [children] rows. Usually a [Text] widget.

fields.name: footer
fields.desc: Sets the form section footer. The section footer lies below the [children] rows. Usually a [Text] widget.

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: Margin around the content area of the section encapsulating [children].

fields.name: children
fields.desc: The list of rows in the section. Usually a list of [CupertinoListTile]s.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: Sets the background color behind the section.

fields.name: dividerMargin
fields.desc: The starting offset of a margin between two list tiles.

fields.name: additionalDividerMargin
fields.desc: Additional starting inset of the divider used between rows. This is used when adding a leading icon to children and a divider should start at the text inset instead of the icon.

fields.name: topMargin
fields.desc: Margin above the list section. Only used in edge-to-edge variant and it matches iOS style by default.

fields.name: separatorColor
fields.desc: Sets the color for the dividers between rows, and borders on top and bottom of the rows.
